author: Andrew Beaton
title: NFL Adopts New Anthem Policy to Quell Player Protests - WSJ
text:
The NFL made sweeping changes to its national anthem policy Wednesday in a bid to quell a controversy that has rattled the league for two years and drew the ire of President Donald Trump.
Under a new policy approved by NFL owners this week at a meeting in Atlanta, teams can be fined if their players are on the field during the national anthem and do not “stand and show respect” for the flag.
